attributes.additional_details:
Redundancy applicants on Tranche 2 were lead to believe their split service would be aggregated for their redundancy payment. This did not happen.

Tranche 1 of the redundancies, and Tranche 3 had their service aggregated.

Many asked for their pension to be aggregated in order to receive a bigger redundant payment, which did not happen.

They will now receive their pension 10 years later. And still haven't had a decision on their redundancy payment. The complaints are still sitting with Service Complaints Commission nearly 2 years on.

Please sign and share to raise awareness of this issue. Full payments should be made to the 75-100 ex service personnel affected by this plus any interest lost.
